column5: Hey Gang the river is getting very sloppy ...stay off the ice around the dam area ....Mannis and down river is most likely still safe but stay away from the dam area unlless your shore fishing ..Beside that Walleye Season closes the 15th of March .. If you want Crappies now is the time to start fishing them in the Marinas and Back Bays...Be Smart Stay away from Fast Water Ways ..
Great post -  All be careful - you all want to be there when the season reopens!!!!
